title: Spiritual Seminar Screenings - Los Angeles
desc: ***No Seminar October 27. Join us for a "Home Seminar Celebration" with John Morton @ 2101 Wilshire Blvd, Santa Monica, CA*** Join us for a casual evening dedicated to exploring "practical spirituality."? Watch recorded talks given by  John-Roger, D.S.S . ,  on topics exploring meditation, forgiveness, personal growth, and spirituality. Listen to short guided meditations  and experience an inner attunement to your own Divinity.? There is time for questions and sharing with one another. Light refreshments are served afterwards. Sponsored by a group of "millennials" - for people of all ages.? Feel free to come early to explore the labyrinth and meditation gardens. ? ? Every Tuesday Evening 7:30-9:00pm (No Seminar on Oct 27 due to a Live John Morton Seminar Event @ 2101 Wilshire Bl, Santa Monica, CA, 7:30pm - Join us there!)?
